title: Please review my perma ban
body:
my ign is : I L  
i got perma banned for trying to help my team understand the game, plz just review it 

thanks

replies.body:
Your best bet at having a punishment reviewed is to submit a ticket via [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to appeal (keep in mind it's best to provide as much relevant info as you can).

Also, I'd recommend ignoring Ethvn, accounts do get unbanned if the ban is made in error (they're just salty because they did the wrong thing and got punished for it).
